DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetic profile Esomeprazole ( D961H ) repeat oral administration without co-administration loxoprofen pharmacokinetic profile loxoprofen repeat oral administration without co-administration Esomeprazole ( D961H ) .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study Esomeprazole ( D961H ) Capsule Loxoprofen Tablet After Repeated Oral Administration Japanese Males
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male Body Mass Index ( BMI=weight/height2 ) 1927 ( kg/m2 ) Body weight 5080 kg Past present NSAIDs induce asthma , hepatic dysfunction , peptic ulcer blood disorder Significant clinical illness 2 week precede preentry visit randomisation , judge investigator ( ) , eg , acute inflammatory disease require medical intervention Past present cardiac , renal , hepatic , neurological gastrointestinal disease , judge investigator ( ) , eg , sequelae myocardial infarction , nephritis , hepatitis cerebral infarction
